turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks please for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Sfarbucks store would you like to pick up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get it at 410 Hunt road blue ash ohio, 45236..

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have found that on the ordering app what would you like today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Cafe Mocha please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I don't want any whip cream today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the chocolate drizzle topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so just a venti cafe mocha, with almond milk no whip cream and no toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: THat is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How soon would you like to pick this up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get it in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok your total is 5.45 and it will be ready at the blue ash location in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I paid for it with your app and stored credit card. A receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you have a good day, good bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good bye.
